title: Pitch templates + calibration inputs per venue/pitch
scope: Define pitch templates (dimensions/markings model) and calibration input schema per venue/pitch.
Represent calibration inputs as explicit, versioned records (not ad-hoc arguments).
Do not implement auto-fit or manual calibration UI here (handled by subsequent tasks).
acceptance: Pitch template and calibration input schemas are explicit and stable (suitable for versioning).
Schemas support multiple venues/pitches without duplicating large blobs in a single file.
Output contract template documents the calibration inputs/templates.

deliverables.title: Pitch template and calibration input schema
acceptance: Pitch template schema covers pitch dimensions and relevant markings model.
Calibration input schema supports per-venue/pitch configuration and versioning.
evidence: A minimal pipeline run loads/validates a sample calibration input record.

deliverables.title: Output contract template updated for calibration inputs/templates
acceptance: Contract documents calibration input fields and pitch template semantics.
evidence: `npm run generate` renders docs reflecting the updated contract template.

subtasks.title: Define pitch templates and calibration inputs for a venue/pitch.
done_when: Pitch template schema is explicit and versioned.
Calibration input schema is explicit and supports multiple venues/pitches.

subtasks.title: Update output contract template for calibration inputs/templates.
done_when: Contract template documents calibration inputs/templates with examples.

subtasks.title: Add loader/validator for calibration input records.
done_when: Calibration input records validate with clear errors for missing/invalid fields.
Validation is deterministic and suitable for guardrails/audits.
